Firmware flash

Overview

APIs are for firmware update More…

// global functions

xpum_result_t xpumRunFirmwareFlash(
    xpum_device_id_t deviceId,
    xpum_firmware_flash_job* job
    );

xpum_result_t xpumGetFirmwareFlashResult(
    xpum_device_id_t deviceId,
    xpum_firmware_type_t firmwareType,
    xpum_firmware_flash_task_result_t* result
    );

Detailed Documentation

APIs are for firmware update

Global Functions

xpum_result_t xpumRunFirmwareFlash(
    xpum_device_id_t deviceId,
    xpum_firmware_flash_job* job
    )

Run firmware flashing by device.

This function will return immediately. To query the firmware flash job status, call xpumGetFirmwareFlashResult

Parameters:

deviceId

IN: Device id

job

IN: The job description for firmware flash

Returns:

xpum_result_t

xpum_result_t xpumGetFirmwareFlashResult(
    xpum_device_id_t deviceId,
    xpum_firmware_type_t firmwareType,
    xpum_firmware_flash_task_result_t* result
    )

Get the status of firmware flash job.

This function will return immediately. Caller may have to call this function multiple times until result indicates firmware flash job is finished.

Parameters:

deviceId

IN: Device id

firmwareType

IN: The firmware type to query status

result

OUT: The result of the job

Returns:

  • XPUM_OK

  • XPUM_RESULT_DEVICE_NOT_FOUND

  • XPUM_UPDATE_FIRMWARE_IMAGE_FILE_NOT_FOUND

  • XPUM_UPDATE_FIRMWARE_ILLEGAL_FILENAME

  • XPUM_UPDATE_FIRMWARE_UNSUPPORTED_AMC

  • XPUM_UPDATE_FIRMWARE_UNSUPPORTED_AMC_SINGLE

  • XPUM_UPDATE_FIRMWARE_UNSUPPORTED_GFX_ALL

  • XPUM_UPDATE_FIRMWARE_MODEL_INCONSISTENCE

  • XPUM_UPDATE_FIRMWARE_IGSC_NOT_FOUND

  • XPUM_UPDATE_FIRMWARE_INVALID_FW_IMAGE

  • XPUM_UPDATE_FIRMWARE_FW_IMAGE_NOT_COMPATIBLE_WITH_DEVICE

  • XPUM_GENERIC_ERROR
